data.actual_result: Even if you don't mark the channel read, clicking unread channels increases memory by 8-10MB for every message that was posted into the channel. This continues until your client crashes.
data.expected_result: Going to any channel would keep memory at nominal levels of 250MB.
data.short_description: Memory leaks occur every time you click on channels with unread messages
data.steps_to_repro: - Open Task Manager. - Open Discord. - Find a server with unread messages. - Click a channel which has unread messages (even if there are none there). - Observe memory usage in Task Manager.
